title: President Donald J. Trump is Acting to Enforce the Law, While Keeping Families Together – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Immigration	

Issued on:
June 20, 2018
It’s about keeping families together, while at the same time, being sure that we have a very powerful, very strong border.
						President Donald J. Trump					SECURING THE BORDER, KEEPING FAMILIES TOGETHER: President Donald J. Trump is using his existing executive authority to address family separation of illegal alien border-crossers.REFUSING TO DO THEIR JOB: Congressional Democrats have chosen to play politics with a humanitarian and national security crisis. CONGRESS MUST ACT: Lawmakers must still pass legislation to secure our border and to finally and fully allow family and minor detention and prompt removal.
